channel.title: Rip4D's Model Topic
channel.description:
Yes. I'm making a topic for all of my models now.
Anyways, I've decided to go back into modeling. I can manipulate primitives a lot better than I used to, and I'm just a little bit less lazy than before. So yea, I'm making models. Some may be from boredom, others may just be from something that inspired me. Well I better stop rambling. I will likely release the majority of my models, so enjoy :D NOTE: I will include the ints for class8, but not item4.
[b]--Simple Broadsword--[/b] Link: http://uppit.com/v/KK65FQ33 Polycount: 168 Renders: [img]http://img46.imageshack.us/img46/1997/simplebroadswordr1.png[/img] [img]http://img209.imageshack.us/img209/8350/simplebroadswordr2.png[/img] [img]http://img137.imageshack.us/img137/4982/simplebroadswordr3.png[/img]
[b]--Hand Blade--[/b] Link: http://uppit.com/v/7XUXBMSW Polycount: 708 Renders: [img]http://img24.imageshack.us/img24/6761/handblade23r.png[/img] [img]http://img692.imageshack.us/img692/9841/handblade22r.png[/img] [img]http://img24.imageshack.us/img24/5735/handblade21r.png[/img]
[b]--Sims Crystal--[/b] (lol) Link: http://uppit.com/v/7393LLRI Polycount: 16 Renders: [img]http://img695.imageshack.us/img695/2623/simcrystalr2.png[/img] [img]http://img683.imageshack.us/img683/4167/simcrystalr1.png[/img]
[b]--Oddity--[/b] Link: http://uppit.com/v/CR03Z5F8 Polycount: 688 Renders: [img]http://img707.imageshack.us/img707/1448/oddityr.png[/img] [img]http://img13.imageshack.us/img13/6561/oddityrw.png[/img]
[b]--POKEBALL!!--[/b](Because all others aren't accurate) Link: attached to post Polycount: 288 Renders: [img]http://img192.imageshack.us/img192/7723/pokeballr.png[/img]
--More coming soon--
PS: Bumps are appreciated :D

item.title: Rip4D's Model Topic
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

That hand blade is a little strange to me.

I thought the hilt of it would be more of a closed circle, not so wide.

Read full topic
